name: iot-smart-trolley
description: Final year project, a smart shopping trolley which is build using React, a SQL Database which store user data & products of shopping complex, firebase is used for signing and logging of user and the logic part is written using node & express and the smart trolley device is build using c++

scripts.client:run: npm start env-cmd react-scripts start --prefix client
scripts.start: npm run client && npm run server
